definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: Absorption is also dependent upon air flow rates and the partial pressure of the gases in the inspired air.
sentences.chinese: 吸收也取决于空气流速和吸入空气中的气体分压。

sentences.english: An experimental study to investigate bubble detachment point in the sub-cooled boiling at low pressure and velocity is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 叙述了低压低流速下过冷沸腾汽泡脱离点的试验研究。

sentences.english: Vertical velocity distribution of distorted model is not similar.
sentences.chinese: 变态河工模型垂线流速分布是不相似的。

sentences.english: This paper mainly discussed the design of overland flow velocity detecting instrument based on FPGA.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要研究了基于FPGA的坡面流流速仪。

sentences.english: This system focused on the anemometry at low velocity range.
sentences.chinese: 该系统主要作用是针对低流速环境中的流速测定。

sentences.english: This system focused on the anemometry at low velocity range.
sentences.chinese: 该系统主要作用是针对低流速环境中的流速测定。

sentences.english: The hydrometric pendulum is sometimes used to determine flow velocities in open channels.
sentences.chinese: 测流速的摆锤有时用于确定明渠中的流速。

sentences.english: The hydrometric pendulum is sometimes used to determine flow velocities in open channels.
sentences.chinese: 测流速的摆锤有时用于确定明渠中的流速。

sentences.english: Third, watch if the flow of fuel via dis- penser is uniform.
sentences.chinese: 三是观察加油机流速是否均匀正常。

sentences.english: The flow value was not zero during zero-point adjustment.
sentences.chinese: 做零点调整过程中，流速不为零。

sentences.english: Anisotropy of soil properties decreased the variability of the vertical Darcian flux.
sentences.chinese: 土壤介质的各向异性降低垂向达西流速的变异性。

sentences.english: Warm winters, however, may allow iceberg calving and high flow rates to continue.
sentences.chinese: 但是暖冬则会让冰山的高崩离率以及高流速保持不变。

sentences.english: The change in flow velocity was used to calculate the autoregulation index.
sentences.chinese: 流速的改变被用来计算自身调节指数。

sentences.english: The shear velocity above the canopy is larger than that within the canopy.
sentences.chinese: 冠层内水流切变流速的减小有利于粘性泥沙的沉积。

sentences.english: Formulas of the displacement of riprap are derived from the elliptic velocity formula.
sentences.chinese: 以椭圆流速分布公式出发，建立了抛石位移计算公式。

sentences.english: The current velocity decreased and the suspended sediment concentration increased from the surf zone to the near shore.
sentences.chinese: 由破波带向岸方向，流速逐渐减小，含沙量逐渐增加。

definition: against the stream/adverse current/a countercurrent/fig. reactionary tendency/to go against the trend
Reynolds number (ratio of inertial forces to viscous forces in fluid mechanics)
to flow/to circulate/to go from place to place/to be mobile/(of assets) liquid
